"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/readme","text":"<center> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-gray-tw/status}} </center>

* Grey Your Website On Some Special Days

[ ] add enable button
[ ] special gray automatically

<!-- * maybe the spotlight widget have a solution -->
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/icon","text":"<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" viewBox="0 0 128 128"
class="tc-image-plugin-generic-plugin tc-image-button" fill="#FF7F87"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M40.397 76.446V95.34h14.12l-.001-.005a6.912 6.912 0 005.364-11.593l.046-.023a6.912 6.912 0 119.979.526l.086.055a6.914 6.914 0 004.408 10.948l-.023.092h21.32V75.568l-.15.038a6.912 6.912 0 00-11.593-5.364l-.022-.046a6.912 6.912 0 11.526-9.979l.055-.086a6.914 6.914 0 0010.948-4.408c.079.018.158.038.236.059v-15.74h-21.32l.023-.094a6.914 6.914 0 01-4.408-10.947 10.23 10.23 0 00-.086-.055 6.912 6.912 0 10-9.979-.526l-.046.023a6.912 6.912 0 01-5.364 11.593l.001.005h-14.12v12.847A6.912 6.912 0 0129.5 59.843l-.054.086a6.912 6.912 0 10-.526 9.979l.023.046a6.912 6.912 0 0111.455 6.492zM64 0l54.56 32v64L64 128 9.44 96V32L64 0z"/></svg>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-gray-tw/status":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-gray-tw/status","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/style
\define tag() $:/tags/Stylesheet
\define mode() $:/status/neotw-gray-tw/mode

<$list filter=<<mode>> variable=".state">

  <!-- show -->
  <$reveal state=<<.state>> type="nomatch" text="show">
    <$fieldmangler tiddler=<<tid>>>
      <$button set=<<.state>> setTo="show">Disable {{neotw/icon/warn}}
        <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param=<<tag>>/>
      </$button>
    </$fieldmangler>
  </$reveal>

  <!-- hide -->
  <$reveal state=<<.state>> type="match" text="show">
    <$fieldmangler tiddler=<<tid>>>
      <$button set=<<.state>> setTo="hide">Enable {{neotw/icon/approve}}
        <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param=<<tag>>/>
      </$button>
    </$fieldmangler>
  </$reveal>

</$list>

<$button>
  <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<tid>>/> Reset
</$button>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-grey-tw/style","<!-- tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet -->","text":"html {
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(grayscale=0.85);
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);}

<!-- filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(grayscale=1); -->

"}}}
